DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study CGD-01/2000 was to investigate wheter a transverse coloplasty pouch is able to improve functional results and quality of life after coloanal anastomosis.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Two Techniques of Rectal Reservoir in Low Anterior Resection of Rectum
DOC.criteria: Low or middle rectal adenocarcinoma without involvement of the anal sphincter Neoadjuvant chemoradiotherapy Age older than 18 years Wexner index of less than 5 Signed informed consent Involvement of the anal sphincter Wexner index of 5 or more Declined informed consent Psychological or social problems
